Interface CoverageLine

All Superinterfaces:
com.guidewire.cc.domain.aggregatelimit.CoverageSpecification
public interface CoverageLine extends com.guidewire.cc.domain.aggregatelimit.CoverageSpecification
CoverageLine An annual or lifetime aggregate limit on a policy or coverage.

  • Method Details

    • getCoveredItemString

      String getCoveredItemString()
      Builds and returns a display ready String representing this coverage line.
      Returns:
      a human-readable string representing this coverage line

    • getCoveredItemString

      String getCoveredItemString(Policy policy)
      Builds and returns a display ready String representing this coverage line in the context of the given policy. If this coverageline's PolicySystemId is set, and Policy is not null, returns a String referencing the risk unit number of the risk unit with the same PolicySystemId. Otherwise, returns a String referencing the coverageline's exposure unit number, if any.
      Parameters:
      policy - the policy in whose context the covered item should be displayed
      Returns:
      a human-readable string representing this coverage line
